article.headline: DePaul 70, Detroit 64
article.story: DETROIT (AP) -- Draelon Burns scored 19 points and Dar Tucker added 18 on Saturday to help DePaul hold off a late Detroit rally for 70-64 victory. Jon Goode had 25 points for the Titans (4-8), who went on a 14-2 run late in the game to erase a double-digit deficit. They trailed 64-61 after Josh Samarco made a 3-pointer with 51.6 seconds to play, but DePaul's Mac Koshwal scored the next two baskets to end the threat. Koshwal had 16 points for the Blue Demons (4-7), who won their second straight. The Blue Demons started the second half 9-for-14 from the field to take control. DePaul led by as many as 15 points before Detroit made its comeback. Chris Hayes had 14 points and eight rebounds for the Titans, who lost their sixth straight game. The Blue Demons led 32-30 at halftime, despite nine turnovers that turned into 17 Detroit points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
